name: Help (itch) (nogr8ness)
description:
v1.0

--------------------

Avoid the spikes coming at you from the right! Unfortunately, there is no true escape, so you will be stuck here forever. Unless...

--------------------

PLAYER 1 CONTROLS:

Left/Right Arrow: move horizontally

Up Arrow: jump

PLAYER 2 CONTROLS:

A/D: move horizontally

W: jump
